thread.section_title: Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: "Highly recommended accommodation!"
thread.title_full: "Highly recommended accommodation!" - Review of Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: eakok
title: "Highly recommended accommodation!"
text: This charming hotel with it's Chinese decorative walls and furniture was comfortable and immaculate. The staff was very helpful and friendly and the service was superb. Rooms were comfortable, clean and well-equipped. Upon checking out we received a lovely tin with Chinese tea to take home as a souvenir. I will recommend this hotel to everybody and would definitely like to return one day.
